summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 4865 lux) and cloud levels (up 282 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), light levels (up 4264 lux), and cloud levels (up 107 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and mostly calm with light air movement. Possible light showers, occasional overcast conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. The weather will likely remain the same.
